Package ua.java.conferences.model.dao.mysql

Class MysqlEventDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • ua.java.conferences.model.dao.mysql.MysqlEventDAO
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EntityDAO<Event>, EventDAO
    public class MysqlEventDAO
extends java.lang.Object
implements EventDAO
    Event DAO class for My SQL database. Matches table 'event' in database.
